attributes.title: Joss Stilwood
attributes.8: yes==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, Joss Stilwood is the squire of Ser Gregor Clegane. He takes part in the gang rape of Layna the Innkeeper's daughter.==See also==* AWOIAF (spoilers from the books)==References==ReflistClegane navboxDEFAULTSORT:Stilwood, JossCategory:CharactersCategory:Season 1 CharactersCategory:Background CharactersCategory:House Clegane

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Joss Stilwood is the squire of Ser [[Gregor Clegane]]. He takes part in the gang rape of Layna the [[Innkeeper's daughter]].
